result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher J. KLEIN

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Transcript of Plea and Sentencing Hearing held on 02-05-2016 .
Copy of Transcript mailed to Registrar at Dodge Correctional Institution.

Defendant in custody.   
State moves to dismiss and read in this charge, the defendant entered a plea in Case File 15 CF 431.   Motion granted.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody on WRIT.
This matter is reset to 02-05-16 at 8:30 a.m.
Minutes.

Writ of Habeas Corpus Ad Prosequendum and Order to Sheriff to transport defendant for his plea/sentencing hearing on 02-04-16 at 3:00 p.m. 
Copy filed.
Plea/Sentencing hearing reset to 12-15-2015 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 3.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.    
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.   Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Plea date in Branch 3 set for 02-04-16 at 3:00 p.m.    
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 11-24-15 at 2:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $500.00 cash with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours.   Bail not furnished.   Defendant is remanded to the county jail.   Commitment for failure to furnish bai issued.   Copy filed.    
Minutes.

RE:  Bail jumping, on 10-05-15.
Initial appearance is set for 11-16-15 at 2:30 p.m.
